# Resistance Item (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level: [[1st Level Artificer Spells|Artificer 1]]**

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** S, M (*o*il mixed with various spices and minerals)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Item touched

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Eberron Campaign Setting (WotC)Â­, pg. 114

A nonmagical item imbued with this infusion grants a +1 resistance bonus on saving throws to a character who wears or wields it. This bonus increases by 1 for every four caster levels (to +2 at 4th level, +3 at 8th level, +4 at 12th level, and so forth).
